verses.roman:
tat-putraḥ ketumān asya
jajñe bhīmarathas tataḥ
divodāso dyumāṁs tasmāt
pratardana iti smṛtaḥ

synonyms: tat-putraḥ—his son (the son of Dhanvantari); ketumān—Ketumān; asya—his; jajñe—took birth; bhīmarathaḥ—a son named Bhīmaratha; tataḥ—from him; divodāsaḥ—a son named Divodāsa; dyumān—Dyumān; tasmāt—from him; pratardanaḥ—Pratardana; iti—thus; smṛtaḥ—known.
translation: The son of Dhanvantari was Ketumān, and his son was Bhīmaratha. The son of Bhīmaratha was Divodāsa, and the son of Divodāsa was Dyumān, also known as Pratardana.
